answers.answer: Hi Shannon,Well you really made my day today! Thank you for writing in. I am so glad that you were able to take the bull by the horns and reverse all of this. That is exceptional work, many congratulations to you!Take care and do let us know how you are doing by and by.All the best to you.

question: HI, I just wanted to drop back by and let you know that you really helped me.  I asked you about 4 months ago if I could reverse early diabetes.  I had a fatty liver, high triglycerides, high sugar, and had gained 40 lbs since having a TAH.  I never even knew all that stuff was related.  You gave me hope that it could all be reversed when many said it couldn't.  I wanted to let you know, I have reversed everything.  I lost 35 lbs, exercise daily, eat much better, (low carb)  I recently went to the doctor for a follow up .  My liver blood work is normal, fat levels normal,  sugar normal, hA1C great.  I feel better and have more energy!  Thanks for giving me hope and making it possible to do what I needed to do!  Shannon
title: Thanks for your support
